title: How do i get a rioter to play with me for my 3000th win?
body: How do i get a rioter to play with me for my 3000th win, i never got the chance to find one for the 1000th or the 2000th. Any details would be nice.

replies.body:
Heyo! 

It's just a matter of seeing your post/having some free time to play. There's a lot more of you then there are of us! :]  Feel free to hit me up when you're at 2,999. I'd be happy to play for your 3,000th win!
